website_summaries.verdict: This high-end refrigerator water filter blends affordability and durability.
pros: Filter is simple to install in just seconds
Delivers superb water filtration, often resulting in great-tasting water
Sold with a lifetime manufacturer's guarantee
Ensures you will only need to replace your refrigerator's filter approximately every 6 months
cons: May slow down the flow of water from a refrigerator's water spout

customer_reviews.title: The filter does not work in my refrigerator. When ...
customer_reviews.text: The filter does not work in my refrigerator. When I installed it, no water came out of the door. I cannot find a way to contact the seller to ask for a refund. The center hole in this filter is much smaller than the filter I am replacing. It is not a straight switch with the GE brand filter.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: I would give it "0" stars if I could - the water stream was so slight that it took 45 seconds to fill a 10 oz. glass, this was beyond slow. It would be quicker to fill a glass with water by standing outside in the rain than getting water through this filter. Luckily for me, Amazon refunded my money without any hassle - I guess that is why I continue to buy from Amazon. I took a chance with this generic filter to save money, but it definitely is not worth the savings - already ordered the name brand filter. Perhaps this filter is an adequate substitute on some GE model refrigerators, but definitely not mine.
customer_reviews.author: amrcrg

customer_reviews.title: 👎🏻
customer_reviews.text: This is terrible. I've purchased several filters for my fridge, and this particular one is not filtering adequately. I have been checking the impurities in the "filtered" water after passing through this filter, and the water is still greatly impure. At the beginning of the week the impurities were over ~100 ppm, and the water was noticeably cloudy. As the week progressed, the level dropped to ~80 ppm; now, the level is at ~40 ppm. As a control, my tap water is ~96 ppm. In the past when I've used filters from other companies, the impurities were ~20 ppm or less with the same monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Ryals-Starling

customer_reviews.title: Buyers beware
customer_reviews.text: Buyers beware. This is the second time I have ordered from this company. I ordered the first approximately 4 months ago. I just received the second one and installed it. The new one did not work properly. It reduced the water flow by over half. After hours of trouble shooting I finally figured out why. The internal designs were different. The packaging and labels were the same. Time is money and this was 100% not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: G. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Filter clogged system and cost $350 repair bill
customer_reviews.text: Two weeks after installing this knockoff my water pump started making a really weird noise and water came out at a trickle. The cheap filter broke down and caused an unrepairable clog in the system and had to get all new hose assembly. I saved $30 on the filter, but then had to spend $350 to get my refrigerator fixed. I'd say that's not worth the risk. Buy the real thing and stay away from this trash.
customer_reviews.author: Jamison

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with the product. Even with this filter, the water quality was very bad. I tested the water quality with a TDS meter I bought recently and here are the readings: 1. Tap Water - 196 2. Refrigerator dispenser (with the 'Best' water filter) - 209 3. Costco Kirkland bottle - 18 4. RO filter I installed now - 15 The smaller and closer to 0 the number, the better is the water quality. So, this filter gave me the worst results!
customer_reviews.author: Jas G

customer_reviews.title: Skip this one if you want clear water!
customer_reviews.text: Attempting a refund through customer service. It arrived quickly and installed perfectly. I let it run for a bit and the water came out looking funny, not clear. I let it rest. Came back and tried again. Same weird bubbled look to the water. I let it sit and the bubbled look is still there after 20 minutes. Don't know if I got a bad one or not, but I will stick with the real deal in the future. I have a GE Adorable fridge from HD if it matters UPDATE: Amazon immediately issued a refund without question. Thanks guys!!!!
customer_reviews.author: pluckiducki

customer_reviews.title: 5+ thirst quenching stars
customer_reviews.text: Imagine walking through a forest full of lush green trees, woodland animals and crisp, clean air. Each footstep pillowed by the soft, dark earth. You stumble upon a brook; so clear and blue its like glass. You see yourself in its reflection. You kneel down to the dewy waters edge and cup your hands, lowering them into the water. Your sandpaper tongue begging for moisture. Your hands emerge, cupped in offering. You raise your hands, overfull with your bounty, to your lips and sip. The relief you feel at the waters touch to the back of your throat is akin to an assault. That is what my water tastes like with this filter
customer_reviews.author: Shannon B.

customer_reviews.title: Great substitute filter, but you needto research install info online
customer_reviews.text: Contrary to what most people were saying against this generic product, it has worked well for me. There are no instructions for installation so you kinda have to search for online. Anyway you need to pour water into the water filter previously before installing it to minimize the air pocket and prevent cavitation. I observed it took about ten minutes worth of water flow until my water did not taste briny, or like slight chlorination (which I believe came from the filter). It is working great even to today. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Compatible in fit but not the Safety
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item without noticing this product does not provide the protection of filtering NSF 53. Website implied that this product provided the same filtering capability as the more expensive GE filter but at a lower cost. Now that I realize I'm only getting one half of the filtering ( taste and color only) not the most important part which is to remove harmful pesticides, etc. I need to return this item. My family's health and safety comes first.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Wells

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was cheaper than GE. However, I wish I would have stuck with the real deal because the cartridge is stuck I have tried several times moved every which way and the cartridge will not come out from the filter in the refrigerator. I am afraid to yank on it for fear it will break the water system. I wish I never bought this product. The water taste fine after a few days. Be careful when you install I found the opening part of the cartridge smaller then the GE maybe that is why it's stuck..
customer_reviews.author: tunwewec

customer_reviews.title: Not GE MWF compatible Doesn’t fit most fridges. Not eligible to return
customer_reviews.text: This filter is not compatible with GE MWF model. This does not fit my Kenmore fridge as well as many other fridges. To add insult to injury Amazon is telling me this item cannot be returned. So don’t waste your money and time on this piece of brick. Regret ordering this item. Will go to a near by Box store and pick a matching replacement filter from there. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Iguana

customer_reviews.title: Great OEM replacement...
customer_reviews.text: Great OEM replacement and for a great value. Just bought a house and the fridge needed a new water filter. Saw that the OEM filter was 50$ and this one was only around 20$. Figured i'd buy this one and give it a shot, so far so good. Fit just like the original one and hasn't giving me any issues. So far I would recommend this over the OEM since it seems to preform the same and is half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: 6 months of clean water
customer_reviews.text: What can I say. It's a water filter. After you install it, you need to dump out about 2 gallons of water because it tastes weird. (Water your plants if you don't want to waste water) I also dump the first 2 batches of ice from the ice maker. After that, smooth tasting water for about 6 months. Easy to install, but I have a hard time getting it out so my husband does it. There are other brands but we stick with GE because we want to be assured of the quality and that it lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: BJ Smith

customer_reviews.title: The product title and description is deceiving
customer_reviews.text: This is marketed as an exact replacement for the GE filter. It is very hard to see that it only removes odor/color - not microbes. The one that came in my GE fridge was for both so this isn't an exact replacement. The description should be more clear. This is a case of 'you get what you pay for'. The ones that remove both are 2x expensive I guess for a reason. For this reason, I don't think it should be an Amazon Choice recommendation. It looks like from the comments several buyers have been confused by this. Will read all of the comments next time!
customer_reviews.author: T. Mattson

customer_reviews.title: Fits like OEM...Does it work the same? Who really knows!?
customer_reviews.text: It fits as well as the GE brand one..And cost MUCH less..! It also comes shrink wrapped/sealed... Unlike the GE one though, there's no indicator to show where the end position is supposed to be.. Anyway, make sure that you PUSH IN (UP) before turning this, both when removing the old one and installing the new one... It's probably a good 1/2" you have to push it up...You may have to fiddle with it/turn it until you feel it catch and when you do turn it to the left to install and to the right to uninstall...
customer_reviews.author: MLL

customer_reviews.title: No longer half full.
customer_reviews.text: The flow had diminished down to a mere trickle. I could leave a vessel in the port, cook an entire meal and return to a beverage still partially full. Connections were checked, household water pressure increased, incense burned and prayer lifted up for the four month old refrigerator. Then, a light came on in the darkness, a vision of a possible solution. Patience was needed (but not much: for it was Prime!) before the solution was realized. A used filter, heavy with exhaustion, removed and a new installed, quick as can be. With trepidation an empty vessel approached the alcove and in seconds was overflowing with liquid goodness. Balance was restored and dehydration a mere memory of times past.
customer_reviews.author: K. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great Water Filter for the price
customer_reviews.text: This works great so far. Installed same as the current filter in place. Initially, there is a gush of water when you try and pour water for the very first time and from then on it works pretty smoothly. I noticed that this water filter does not have all the certifications that the GE water filter has but this is less than half the price of a GE water filter. It would be interesting to see how much this one would be selling for when they acquire all the GE certifications as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bought_enough_to_comment

customer_reviews.title: Danger
customer_reviews.text: DANGER DANGER DANGER water with out filter was 137, water with filter 153. It made the water more contaminated to drink. worst part they send you a water filter that is not the one in the picture. The longer the filter runs the worse the numbers are up to 186 that's 50 ppm more then unfiltered water.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Williams

customer_reviews.title: Discolored Water!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd filter I purchased, the first one seemed fine so when it was time for another one, I saw no reason to not buy again. This time, however, when I ran some water thru to get out the Air, the 2nd glass of water was discolored, almost purple. I have no idea what to make of that. After running about 4 glasses of water, it cleared up. I then ran about 10 more glasses, then tried a taste test. It seems okay, but I just don't know what to make of this. I'm hoping to hear from the company if they read this posting.
customer_reviews.author: David W. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Our refrigerator sensor light went from yellow to red for this filter to be replaced. Once replaced, we found it to be perfect timing. We drink lots of bottled water, but have a water filtration system for the entire house. The filter for our GE refrigerator is back to normal and all of this coming at the right time with the COVID-19 virus currently plaguing the planet.
customer_reviews.author: Art Of Peace

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work just as well as GE
customer_reviews.text: No clue if it filters everything that the GE filter does. Water tastes the same to me. I drink water from the same glass multiple times. After several uses, the glass gets cloudy whether using the GE and this cheaper (just as good) filter Will likely buy again especially now that I'm on a very tight budget. Thanks for providing a solution for my budget :)
customer_reviews.author: E.B.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: The filter does not fot properly. The filter has to be tight in order to depress a tab that allows good water flow. The mokd of the filter is not correct and the water barely trickles out of the water dispenser. If I turn the filter slightly flow improves slightly then goes back to a very slow trickly. The filter appears to be defective because it does not fit tightly like the one the refrigerator came with. This one is clearly at an angle no matter how you install it.
customer_reviews.author: Inspector E

customer_reviews.title: No longer a skeptic
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned when I purchased because of the price difference between the Fridgidare product ($49-at Home Depot) and this product, therefore I only ordered 1. Amazingly it worked just like the expensive version. The only glitch was there were no instructions and because it had been 4 months since I changed I had to do some figuring out. Other than that-it's perfect. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Contamination
customer_reviews.text: After installing this filter and ran approx. 10 gallons of water I still had contamination coming from it. Some sort of paper or plastic pieces mixed with the water. I'm so glad I checked the water before we started to drink it. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is compatible with my GE refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: I've paid for the $50 GE water filters for several years and this time, I thought it is just too expensive, so I gave this one a try...at half the cost! I followed the instruction to fill the new one with water first before installing it and it was a snap. I ran through the first 1.5 gallons as instructed and did not encounter any leaks, particle nor funny sounds during the process. I've used it for several days now and no problems so far. This is for GE model: ZISS420DXASS
customer_reviews.author: GongGongCA

customer_reviews.title: Difficulty installing
customer_reviews.text: Difficulty figuring out how to line it up when trying to insert. It does not come with instructions on how to remove old one and insert new. Resorted to YouTube which referenced lining up arrows, which the replacement cartridge didn’t have. Being short and having to reach to the back of the refrigerator without guidance to uninstall/install made it just that much more difficult. Got it after 2 separate attempts and 20 mins.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, this did not work in my GE refrigerator ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this did not work in my GE refrigerator. Once installed, my water dripped out of the door facet slowly and filled the reservoir below quickly. I tried three times to ensure it wasn't operator error. Also, there was a lot of pressure built up when I went to take this off inside the fridge and it blew through my hand and hit a shelf in the fridge. I didn't have this with a genuine GE filter that I had replaced with this.
customer_reviews.author: Luke A.

customer_reviews.title: Great filter
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical after seeing some of the reviews for this product, but decided to at least give it a try and the GE brand is over $40. I put this filter in and it works wonderfully. I didn't have any problems and the water actually seems to come out better with this filter. I will be ordering more of these in the future.
customer_reviews.author: coffeenut

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper isn't always better
customer_reviews.text: I see others saying this filter doesn't remove the chlorine odor. Of course, chlorine levels are very high these days with Covid-19. As far as this filter (I just received and installed), I don't smell or taste that odor at all. You could find a cheaper filter, you could pay more for a filter, but if you want one that will do the job for a decent price this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Hillenburg

customer_reviews.title: I had a faulty one and they made it right
customer_reviews.text: The first filter I received was defective. I wrote a negative review about how the water had a strong mineral taste after only 2 months. The company reached out and told me I must have a defective one and they sent me a replacement. It worked fine. The next one worked fine. The one I'm using now works fine. These are great, long lasting filters at a fraction of the price and the company made it right when I got one that didn't work as well as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Walker

customer_reviews.title: Okay once you've ran 5 gallons of water though it.
customer_reviews.text: First 5 plus, glasses of water came out silver colored with particulate and whole lot of tiny bubbles. Color cleared up after about 4 gallons. Bubbles disappeared after a 24 hours. I'm not sure what to think? Water tastes fine. I've never experienced this with manufacturer's brand.
customer_reviews.author: Larry from Texas

customer_reviews.title: Can't tell the difference with the name brand filter
customer_reviews.text: I think for $20 dollars this item does exactly what it says. I can't comment about any other fridges but it fit perfectly for my GE fridge. Simple to install and you'll need to run the water until it is clear. For some reason, this filter has made the water dispenser stream even better. I've stopped buying the GE brand and this is my second purchase. I saw there were alot of bad reviews, but for $20 I was willing to try it and this will be my second purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole S

customer_reviews.title: Affordable filter that works for me
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work just fine. Dispenses water faster than OEM filter. I realize this filter does not filter everything the OEM filter does but as I understand it the OEM filters lead and other things that this filter does not and lead is not a problem in my water so it didn't matter.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Worked well briefly
customer_reviews.text: This filter worked well for about 2 months. Water pressure started dropping, and I found that the inner ring that presses on the sensor in the fridge was not making solid contact any longer. Still gave it two stars as the cheap price with the short duration is comparable to the full price item with the max duration. Not worth the hassle for me though.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda York

customer_reviews.title: On the cheap and it shows.
customer_reviews.text: The product itself fits fine in my fridge but when I was first running water through it to ready it for use it seemed like the charcoal was not tightly packed as with the GE brand filters. That was suspect. Now that I have filled several water bottles I can definitely taste the difference. The water tastes just as if it was coming from the faucet without filtration. The product itself didn't come with any information, no instructions, nothing at all. So for being economical, I can see why the minimalist approach. Unfortunately, I will not be purchasing a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Justanopinion

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: My refrigerator began making noise and both the refrigerator and freezer were getting troubling my warmer. Fortunately, just changing the filter brought it back to optimal performance. I will always have a replacement filter on hand, and I will change my filter every six months without fail!
customer_reviews.author: Phil1

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE BEWARE BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: As an OEM part this is not an exact replacement for my GE Refrigerator and as such caused close to $500 damage to the filter system. The repairman showed me where the tip of the valve was broken off due to the filter not being made exactly as GE one which caused the damage. Would like to know if seller is liable?
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Marlin

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I will continue to buy this. They don't tell you but you have to fill with water prior to putting it on and then run the faucet on the fridge a bunch of times because there is always tons of weird debris that comes out. Once that is gone it works great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy here every time!
customer_reviews.text: This product sells for so much more at appliance stores or home improvement stores. While I was standing in the home improvement store I looked this up and found it for 1/3 rd the price! It works just fine with my refrigerator and is easy to install. I will keep buy my refrigerator filters from here!
customer_reviews.author: Italianna

customer_reviews.title: Did not work in GE GSH25JFTFWW
customer_reviews.text: After installing, when getting water, the flow would be normal for a few seconds, then I would hear a thumping noise, and the flow would be much less. The seller did promptly refund me though, which was good. I bought a genuine GE filter and it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: getterdun

customer_reviews.title: I'm not sure if it was changing the filter but ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if it was changing the filter but I have a GE refrigerator and the water dispenser broke as soon as I changed the filter. This has happened before but now but my water line froze I'm not sure if it's the filter my my water line will not unfreeze anymore. I'm rating it a 2 stars because I'm not sure if it is the filter and this has happened before with a GE filter it might be the GE refrigerators might have a problem. My fridge is less than 10 years. But this has always happened. I did not return the filter because I don't know if it going to make a difference now.
customer_reviews.author: Jenpen

customer_reviews.title: GE NEW water filter TopQuality MDF WATER FILTER will not unscrew and is not dispensing water.
customer_reviews.text: The water filter was easy to install and dispenses ice but no water has been dispensed. I have tried to remove the filter to make sure the passages were clear and now the filter will not unscrew so the filter is stuck and I am getting no water. Has anyone else had this problem?
customer_reviews.author: marsha

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: I just tested, my water after installing this is ~230ppm Not bad, the acceptable guideline is less than 500ppm. You can get water jugs like zero water and I get consistently almost 0 ppm....but I don't taste the difference TBH.
customer_reviews.author: AmzC

customer_reviews.title: My first filter was good 🤔
customer_reviews.text: I honestly dont see the issue some of these folks are having 🤔 My filter came in exactly as pictured. It fits perfectly in my fridge. The water pressure increased tremendously from my previous filter which was the same one the fridge came with. I also checked for any particles.... nothing.... I only wonder if its a new batch 🤔 Or maybe if they changed it. I am however super late on doing a review and i bought mine months ago 🤔 Now im a little sketch to get it cuz it was all good reviews when i got it. Now its all bad 😂
customer_reviews.author: minnie

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I must say I was a little hesitant to purchase this item but I did and it's one of the best thing I could have done. We usually get these from our local hardware store at double the price. This is the same expect item at a better price. I will purchase this item again from this seller. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: loulou

customer_reviews.title: Great option!
customer_reviews.text: Amazon in a pinch! Was able to get this same day!! Easy install, Filter box includes a date sticker set to help plan the change interval, nice courtesy! Works just fine, flavor is nice - surprisingly better than (city) tap.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin O.

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: This item works just the same as the one you can buy from a home improvement store or Wal-Mart. However, it is cheaper online and is literally the exact same item. Installation is a little bit of a pain with where the filter attachment in the fridge, but that is not GE fault with the filter as it is out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Lee

customer_reviews.title: Filter caused funny tasting ice and water!
customer_reviews.text: No instructions were included in the package. After researching instructions and installing the filter according to GE instructions online, this filter made my water and ice taste disgusting. I wish I would've left my old filter in the refrigerator. My son's will not drink the water. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kisha

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I reduced my review from 5 stars to 1!! Thought this was a great way to save $ - and bought a spare to keep on hand. After about 6 months, the fridge would intermittently sound like a jack hammer. The repair man told me this filter is not compatible and that I will have to use the GE branded filter. Yes - a lot more $ but I should overcome the compatibility issue. All was fine in the early months - just occurred later. So now I have a spare that I cannot use (missed the return deadline) - so I lost $!!!
customer_reviews.author: jhtpd

customer_reviews.title: Great savings
customer_reviews.text: Great savings on the water filter for our GE refrigerator. So glad I looked on Amazon, as this one was half the price of the ones I usually buy at Lowes and is the exact same thing! easy to install and great for water systems in refrigerator
customer_reviews.author: marymac

customer_reviews.title: Good filter for almost half the price
customer_reviews.text: So far, after a few days, all is well with using this filter. I was nervous at first as the water was really dark grey and the water dispenser leaked after we stopped running it. Neither of these things happened using the name brand filter. I did read in previous reviews that both were an issue for others. But after running the water for a little bit and dumping it, both issues cleared up and the water tastes just fine, no leaking. I would recommend this filter.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Ketchmark

customer_reviews.title: Quality seems to vary
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying this same product over 2 years for my family but I am learning their quality is hit or miss... fortunately mostly a hit. Last one worked great but this purchase in May 2018 didn't work and you can tell by the taste of the water. JUST purchased the same again in September 2018 with hopes that this one works out.
customer_reviews.author: J. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Paid 50.00 for the last filter this one was under 20.00. it looks exactly like the one we replaced. I looked at them side by side and everything was the same. Fit perfectly in my GE fridge super easy install. Will purchase this one from now on!
customer_reviews.author: V.F.

customer_reviews.title: Flooded house
customer_reviews.text: I installed this replacement water filter for my GE refrigerator. It was easy to install and worked great until several weeks after install, while we were outside the house, the filter just came apart. No one touched it, we weren't even in the house. It just came apart at a glue seam and water poured into our house through the now broken filtration system. Now I'm terrified to put any replacement filters in there for fear that it could happen again. I would not trust this replacement filter at all.
customer_reviews.author: John  Heim

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be almost an exact replacement for the OEM filter. I say "almost" because if you look inside, there is a slight narrowness of the water flow area when compared to a GE filter. I've been using this for a couple weeks now and I haven't noticed any operational difference. My wife said my "experiment" of buying a non-OEM filter was a success. So, I guess I did well.
customer_reviews.author: mhogan

customer_reviews.title: Water tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I just moved in to a new condo and the water coming from the dispenser in the fridge was not clean at all and the water was not flowing as it was supposed to. This new filter changed all of that, the water flows great now and tastes exactly like from a water bottle. Will definitely buy this again when it is time to change it out in a few months!
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian Nilsson

customer_reviews.title: It is a junk.. Don't buy.. No returns accepted on this
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this thinking that this will fit my GE filter as they have advertised. But when I tried this it does not work and on top of that when I try to remove it from fritz it just makes a blasting sound and the GE SmartFilter cover was removed with a blasting sound. AND, YOU CAN RETURN IT. So I just wasted a ~$17 for no reason and waited for this to arrive for three days. Waste of time and waste of money. I would never recommend this product to anyone. BTW, the amazon didn't allow me submit the review without selecting the rating, but I would give a minus rating as this wasted my money and time
customer_reviews.author: DisAppointedCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Great filter for a decent price.
customer_reviews.text: I had read some negative reviews about this, but my mom had purchased the same one and had no problems so I gave it a shot. I installed it as soon as it came in the mail. My husband said something was wrong with our water dispenser on our fridge. So for 5 years that's what I believed! Come to find out it was just needing a new filter!!! This fixed it. I had to run the water for a few minutes to flush the stuff that sat for so long in the tubing, but now we have clean ice and fridge water. I will be buying this again as soon as our filter light comes on again.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Schetzsle

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Price is better
customer_reviews.text: Remember to pour a glass of water once and pour it out before drinking. When I replaced my GE filter with this one, it did spurt out and shoot out air for a while which would scare a puppy or a little kid. Water tastes fine. Might have an unrelated issue with my ice maker which doesn't seem to be related to the water filter. But I add it here in the event that others have an issue with this
customer_reviews.author: Nando

customer_reviews.title: Still A Winner
customer_reviews.text: Update: 5/11/2020: I can't tell you how many times I've ordered these filters for my fridge. They continue to work just as well as the pricier GE branded filters. I don't know what else to say, other than I will purchase these as long as they're sold. Update: 12/3/17 I purchased a new replacement the 2nd week of November. I'm still pleased with the seller, packaging, and product. SO glad I found this filter! It works just as well as the name brand ones, for less money. I'm a wordy person, but there's not much else for me to say.....other than I'll continue to order this filter.
customer_reviews.author: MsSassyLaRue

customer_reviews.title: Good filter at a very good price, just needs instructions.
customer_reviews.text: It would be helpful to include installation directions with this filter (fortunately I had the instructions from a previous manufacturer’s filter). It would also be nice if the filter was marked with install location marks on the filter. Seemed to be a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: T. David

customer_reviews.title: Low price, good filter
customer_reviews.text: The price of this filter made me wonder about the quality, but so far it is performing wonderfully. This filter was easy to install (if your arms are long enough to reach that far back in the fridge - Thanks GE!). I do not know if it is exactly the same as the name brand filter, as the flow is WAY better with this filter. Because the water quality where I live is very good, I have no concerns that it may not filter as much as the GE filter. I am happy with this filter, thankful for the discounted price compared to the brand name, and impressed with the performance so far. It has been installed for a week.
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money!  This one does not work.
customer_reviews.text: The filter is causing my refrigerator to make a loud noise. It is not working and I am unable to get any filtered water from my refrigerator. I have to go out now to buy another filter to replace my replacement. I typically buy a GE brand filter and they always work. This filter was a complete waste of money. I will never buy from this one again.
customer_reviews.author: mloc304

customer_reviews.title: Water Tastes like Chlorine
customer_reviews.text: The filter was easy to install but the water coming out of the fridge tastes terrible. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Lozano

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is about half the price I was paying at major retail hardware stores, glad I found it on Amazon. Very easy to install. Can't state much more about it - easy to use, great value for anyone needing this model for their fridge!
customer_reviews.author: deslin

customer_reviews.title: Replacement part
customer_reviews.text: The filter for my fridge was easy to install and getting it through Amazon was much easier than trying to find what I needed in a home store. I'm very pleased with the transaction and with the merchandise.
customer_reviews.author: Rob in VA

customer_reviews.title: Not a Proper Replacement Filter
customer_reviews.text: ordered 2 as replacements in GE refrigerator over time. When installing found that a small sleeve needed to deal with the mating adapter was missing. Also, the surfaces intended to twist lock with the mating adapter surfaces were slightly wrong and would not assemble. Another brand replacement filter previously used was obtained and worked fine. Something wrong with the Best filter replacement for the GE MWF filter.
customer_reviews.author: Loren E. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: filter isn't working - I have a defective filter!
customer_reviews.text: I just went to replace this cartridge in my fridge and now NO water comes out - I have it screwed in correctly but seem to have a defective product. Please arrange to have this replaced at your very earliest convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne Apostle

customer_reviews.title: Worst filter ever.
customer_reviews.text: Worst water filter ever!! The water tastes gross- Almost like dirt. I had to replace it with another brand right away. I wish I could get a refund on this.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hunter

customer_reviews.title: I wont ourchase again
customer_reviews.text: I was hopeful this was a good alternative to the GE brand MWF filter but it is not. I am unsure what the problem is but mine out too much pressure on the water line and you could get nothing but a trickle from it, never mind flushing it, I could not get a full cup of water. I have read others have had similar issues, others have had almost no filtering, and some have had it work well. Sounds like inconsistent manufacturing to me. I will stick with the GE brand.
customer_reviews.author: timothy j. palmer

customer_reviews.title: NOT COMPATIBLE
customer_reviews.text: Although this filter was listed as compatible with GE MWF, it is NOT. Caused my kitchen floor to be flooded with water that would not stop flowing from dispenser in door. Got neighbors to turn off water behind frig. which was very hard to get too. I am a Prime member and this was not a quality product. When I inserted old filter, water once again worked with no excess dispensing of water.
customer_reviews.author: Carole Childs

customer_reviews.title: Almost no water flow.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if we received a defective unit, but the water trickles out. It takes forever to fill 1 cup. I took it out, hit the reset button on the fridge..?? I don't know. I've had GE fridges for over 10 years and this is the first filter that just didn't work. I'll be returning. I'll update post what the second ones does.
customer_reviews.author: Dyster

customer_reviews.title: Stick with the genuine G.E. brand
customer_reviews.text: This off brand filter is smaller than the GE brand. It fits ok but occasionally leaks. My biggest complaint is that sometimes I notice small particles in the filtered water. Either the filter isn't doing the job or the filter material is disintegrating.
customer_reviews.author: Paul R. Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Average product.
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be filtering the water ok but it makes a terrible noise at times. Could be air in the lines not sure. I did have a little trouble fitting it in my original filter holder.
customer_reviews.author: Redtrain

customer_reviews.title: It worked great, but recommend an arrow for this product...
customer_reviews.text: I filled with water and then put it on and turned right like my GE frig directions say. It didn't work so I took it back out by turning it left, I noticed on my original filter there was an arrow, So I looked inside the new filter top and guessed where the arrow should be and lined it up, turned it right. Water flows just fine now.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: So far..so good!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. At first I was skeptical about it since it had some valid cons about it but after trying it out, the water actually tastes great and it was easy to install. We did the usual process of emptying out a gallon or so of water after we made the water run through it and all...it's been 2 weeks so, we'll see. But as of now, it's worth the price and I'm actually surprised that I'm satisfied with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: KC C.

customer_reviews.title: great replacement filter
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this filter for several months and it works as well as the higher priced GE version. We will keep using these whenever it's time to replace the current one. We totally recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gramma B

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t remove particles from water
customer_reviews.text: After watching a video demonstration of how to install it into the fridge it was rather easy. After allowing water to filter through it and 4 litres later... it still has floating particles in it. Horrible!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Weird chemical flavor, made family sick
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product. We had been getting the filter under this label for a year and had no problems. The last one sent seems to be sold by a different seller. After installing it, we noticed a slightly off flavor occasionally. We also started to feel sick to our stomachs, but didn't connect that they were related until about two weeks after installing it. We stopped drinking the filter water and felt better within the next day. Something is very off about this filter!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Lovell

customer_reviews.title: less expensive
customer_reviews.text: I like that this filter is less money than going through GE, even though it did go up in price a bit. It works. The water tastes so much better than straight tap water
customer_reviews.author: S. Bogacki

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: It has been installed with no problems. Seems to be working fine. Can't rule on it's longevity, but if holds up over it's expected life-span working properly, I'd rate this as a great bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Steven A. Richert

customer_reviews.title: Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Glad to have found this for such a great price. I paid Double the first time at Best Buy. Don’t know what I was thinking. I definitely will be repurchasing in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Cydney

customer_reviews.title: Great filter at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I am still in awe that I could find a filter that fit my fridge for the price you sold it to me! I have paid at least $45 or more for these in my local retailer. Thank you and I will be back!
customer_reviews.author: Nillatrilla

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: The new filter was very easy to install. We ran the water for a few minutes to clear out all the old water, and very much tell the difference in flavor and taste with a new filter. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Simple install and uninstall
customer_reviews.text: We have no choice to change this and this product is the best. Very simple to install and take out of our fridge. We have ordered multiple and its always a smooth process
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Filter never worked.
customer_reviews.text: Filter never engaged. After fifty attempts to install (a simple push and twist) it never worked. No water flow through the dispenser. Re-installed original GE spent filter and it immediately activated. No return policy so it goes in the trash. Will never go with “compatible” cheaper filters again. Buy OEM!
customer_reviews.author: U.S. Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love These!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a couple of months into my BEST filter and I really like ti so far. The fit and finish during/after install is very good and the water tastes great. Like any filter, right after installing it you must cycle water through it for about 15 mins...but after that, the water tastes great. As far as I'm concerned, this specific filter is excellent and is a great way to save a ton of money over the factory OEM filters.
customer_reviews.author: Adventure Photographer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work well: No carbon filtering, bad taste in water
customer_reviews.text: Worth less than you'll pay. This filter is terrible. I live in the desert Southwest, U.S. this filter doesn't help. I will not be buying this discount item, again. Probably works okay, in some places, but not where you actually need it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Bliss

customer_reviews.title: Tasty Water
customer_reviews.text: It has been a few days since we installed the water filter and so far so good. The installation was easy and quick. Exactly what we needed for less price. Definitely will purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Paulie Good Girl

customer_reviews.title: This filter is better than the GE filters!!
customer_reviews.text: We have been buying the original GE filters the whole time for our 15 year old refrigerator. The water on the door had slowed down to a trickle or even a drip even after installing two different GE filters over the past 3 years, so we had just stopped using the water on the door. Now our ice stopped filling so I decided to try one more filter before we called the repair man. And suddenly we have water coming out the door and it’s perfect water pressure and tastes fine!! The GE filters weren’t working and this replacement filter worked! (The ice problem was just a frozen line).
customer_reviews.author: Briana

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the GE brand filter for years, but since it's doubled in price I figured I'd give this a try. We did not notice any difference in taste or appearance so will continue trying this. We didn't do any testing to make sure the water quality is the same as with the GE brand, but it's good enough for us.
customer_reviews.author: ScoobyFan

customer_reviews.title: Best GE MWF filter arrived ahead of projected delivery date ...
customer_reviews.text: Best GE MWF filter arrived ahead of projected delivery date and is a perfect fit and at half the price of the GE filter which I always thought was outrageously overpriced. Thanks to Best i'm saving $$ for the same quality. The only difference between the Best MWF filter and the GE filter is that it doesn’t say GE on it.......who cares especially when you’re saving $$
customer_reviews.author: James J. Middleton

customer_reviews.title: reliable and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: We have ordered these over several years. Very easy to install and work well. We didn't ordered a flavored one so I can't comment on flavor.
customer_reviews.author: JRVV

customer_reviews.title: Why did you change.
customer_reviews.text: I’m very disappointed, I have bought this product numerous times and always been good this time they send me a little different version and it drips water. No matter how you put it in. I need a replacement but I have to ship this one back and I threw my old one away. This sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Jedinak

customer_reviews.title: Filter performance
customer_reviews.text: I bought the filter as a replacement for the existing filter, and the cost was lower than most. The old filter was leaving a chemical taste and this filter improved the taste but it not as good as the old filter when new.
customer_reviews.author: kcoh1

customer_reviews.title: Money saved
customer_reviews.text: So far this items is ok, really can't speak on the flavor yet because they are cleaning our water supply tank and we are using a different water source that does not taste the same as our water.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Great site, good prices, reduced water flow on one of the filters I ordered. Not a big deal, just different...
customer_reviews.text: The site is great, bought other filters when I also ordered this one. After installation I noticed a significant decrease in the water flow. Not that big of deal - I'll just wait a little longer to fill my glass. Maybe this filter is filtering better than the old one and that's why the flow is down. Again not that big of deal but if you're always in a hurry like I am, it's just a slight irritant. Yes, I'll order from this site again after 6 months or so.
customer_reviews.author: FRITZ AKERLUND

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels exactly the same as the name brand filter.
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels exactly the same as the name brand filter. Was skeptical when ordering. No difference in water taste or quality of product. Would definitely order again. The price cant be beat, a name brand filter goes for about twice the price of this generic filter. Installed easily and when i reset filter everything was as expected.
customer_reviews.author: J Sav

customer_reviews.title: Great value for fridge filter
customer_reviews.text: I have used this brand before so this was a reorder for me. Works well. Fast and easy installation. Good performance + good price = Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

product_meta.title: Best GE MWF Refrigerator Water Filter Smartwater Compatible Cartridge
product_meta.description: The product has been given as the following : GE MWF Compatible Refrigerator Filter. Same great quality and a fraction of the price!
feature_bullets: SAME GREAT QUALITY AT A FRACTION OF THE PRICE
100% LIFETIME MONEYBACK GUARANTEE FROM THE MANUFACTURER

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars8,371 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
